title: ChronoSync 4.9.8 – Synchronize, backup, and create bootable backups

title: Metes and Bounds 5.6.0 – Turns data into a plot map
content: Metes and Bounds turns data into a deed plot map. It can calculate square feet, acreage and hectares.   Enter measurements in rods, chains, meters, yards, inches, fathoms, hands, spans, or furlongs. Angles can be given down to minutes and seconds.
